SimplexMethod
Class SimplexMethod

java.lang.Object
  SimplexMethod.SimplexMethod
Direct Known Subclasses:
SimplexModel, SimplexView
public class SimplexMethod
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
Scott Palmer
This is the controller for the view and the model and runs the main function. All the listeners for the view are located here as well as many helper functions for work between the view and model.
